stepTitle: A farmer finds there is a linear relationship between the number of bean stalks, $$n$$, she plants and the yield, $$y$$, each plant produces. When she plants $$30$$ stalks, each plant yields $$30$$ oz of beans. When she plants $$34$$ stalks, each plant produces $$28$$ oz of beans. Find a linear relationship in the form $$y=mn+b$$ that gives the yield when $$n$$ stalks are planted.
